title: SEO Copywriter
job_overview:
We are looking for someone experienced in writing content for SEO part time.

Do send your resume and share your experiences writing them.

We are looking for people who can express distinct brand voices. We do not mind the candidate using AI to plan, but they shouldn't be using AI to write as the content will be flagged out.

It will be a bonus if candidate has digital marketing experience or content experience, understanding how funnels work, and knows how to plan a content strategy and calendar.

https://www.onlinejobs.ph/jobseekers/job/Creative-Specialist-Digitial-MarketingUpgrade to see actual infoOur other job posting
